name: PatronManager
0:
”Alexa, ask PatronManager how many tickets we sold last week”
”Alexa, ask PatronManager which donor to call”
”Alexa, ask PatronManager how many tickets are left for the show tonight”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: patron manager
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask Alexa to analyze your PatronManager Data.

You can ask questions like:
Alexa, ask PatronManager how many tickets were sold today?
Alexa, ask PatronManager how many tickets are left for tonight's show?
Alexa, ask PatronManager for any new Donations this week.
Alexa, ask PatronManager for our Campaign progress.

A PatronManager account is required to use this experimental skill. There are also a few installation steps that the PatronManager team will need to perform for you. If you haven't already, please email workshop@patronmanager.com and ask for the Alexa skill to be enabled.

In order to access your data, you will need to set up a voice code the first time you use this skill. Afterwards, when you request your data by saying "Alexa, open PatronManager", Alexa will have you validate your voice code first to help determine if it's you. You can also change your voice code by requesting "Alexa, ask PatronManager to change my voice code".

At any time, you can stop the skill by saying "Alexa, stop".
